name: Source Collaboration Comment Notification
description: Notifies a reviewer when they have been mentioned in a comment by a collaborator who is configuring a source
subject: $author commented on the $sourceName source configuration
body:
Dear $__recipient.name,

#set($url=$__global.productUrl + '/ui/a' + $uri )

$author left the following comment on the $sourceName source:

$author$comment

 

Go to the $sourceName configuration page or sign in to $__global.productName to reply to this comment.

Thanks,
The $__global.productName Team
